00023 StateSaverSQLite::StateSaverSQLite()
00024 {}

00026 StateSaverSQLite::~StateSaverSQLite()
00027 {
00028     Close();

00030 
00031 void StateSaverSQLite::Open(QMTopology& qmtop, const string& file)
00032 {
00033     _db.OpenHelper(file.c_str());
00034     _frame = 0;
00035     _qmtop=&qmtop;
00036 
00037     // now query available frames in database
00038     Statement *stmt = _db.Prepare("SELECT _id FROM frames;");
00039     while(stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00040         _frames.push_back(stmt->Column<int>(0));
00041     }
00042     delete stmt;
00043 
00044     cout << "Found " << _frames.size() << " in database\n";
00045     _current_frame = -1;
00046     _was_read=false;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void StateSaverSQLite::Close()
00050 {
00051     _db.Close();
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool StateSaverSQLite::NextFrame()
00055 {
00056     _qmtop->Cleanup();
00057     _qmtop->nblist().Cleanup();
00058     _qmtop->CreateResidue("dummy");
00059 
00060     _current_frame++;
00061     if(_current_frame >= _frames.size())
00062         return false;
00063 
00064     ReadFrame();
00065     ReadMolecules();
00066     ReadConjugatedSegments();
00067     ReadBeads();
00068     ReadPairs();
00069     _was_read=true;
00070     return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void StateSaverSQLite::ReadFrame(void)
00074 {
00075     cout << "reading frame " << _current_frame+1 << ", id " << _frames[_current_frame] << endl;
00076     Statement *stmt =
00077         _db.Prepare("SELECT time, step, "
00078             "box11, box12, box13, "
00079             "box21, box22, box23, "
00080             "box31, box32, box33 "
00081             "FROM frames WHERE _id = ?;");
00082     stmt->Bind(1, _frames[_current_frame]);
00083 
00084     if(stmt->Step() == SQLITE_DONE)
00085         throw std::runtime_error("cannot read frame, database might have changed while program is running");
00086 
00087     _qmtop->setTime(stmt->Column<double>(0));
00088     _qmtop->setStep(stmt->Column<int>(1));
00089     cout << "time " << stmt->Column<double>(0) << endl;
00090     matrix m;
00091     for(int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00092         for(int j=0; j<3; ++j)
00093             m.set(i, j, stmt->Column<double>(2+i*3+j));
00094     _qmtop->setBox(m);
00095     _qmtop->setDatabaseId(_frames[_current_frame]);
00096     delete stmt;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void StateSaverSQLite::WriteFrame()
00100 {
00101     _db.BeginTransaction();
00102     Statement *stmt;
00103     
00104     // create a new entry or update existing one
00105     if(_qmtop->getDatabaseId() == 0) {
00106         stmt = _db.Prepare(
00107             "INSERT INTO frames (time, step, "
00108             "box11, box12, box13, box21, box22, box23, box31, box32, box33) "
00109             "VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)");
00110     } else {
00111         stmt = _db.Prepare(
00112             "UPDATE frames SET time = ?, step = ?, "
00113             "box11 = ?, box12 = ?, box13 = ?, box21 = ?, box22 = ?, box23 = ?, box31 = ?, box32 = ?, box33 = ? "
00114             "WHERE _id = ?");
00115         stmt->Bind(12, _qmtop->getDatabaseId());
00116     }
00117 
00118     stmt->Bind(1, _qmtop->getTime());
00119     stmt->Bind(2, _qmtop->getStep());
00120     matrix m = _qmtop->getBox();
00121     for(int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00122         for(int j=0; j<3; ++j)
00123             stmt->Bind(3+i*3+j, _qmtop->getBox().get(i,j));
00124 
00125     stmt->InsertStep();
00126     if(_qmtop->getDatabaseId() == 0)
00127         _qmtop->setDatabaseId(_db.LastInsertRowId());
00128 
00129     delete stmt;
00130 
00131 
00132     int frameid = _db.LastInsertRowId();
00133     WriteMolecules(_qmtop->getDatabaseId());
00134     WriteConjugatedSegments(_qmtop->getDatabaseId());
00135     WriteBeads(_qmtop->getDatabaseId());
00136     WritePairs(_qmtop->getDatabaseId());
00137 
00138     _db.EndTransaction();
00139     _frame++;
00140     _conjseg_id_map.clear();
00141 }
00142 
00143 void StateSaverSQLite::WriteMolecules(int frameid)
00144 {
00145     Statement *stmt;
00146     if(_was_read) return;
00147     stmt = _db.Prepare("INSERT INTO molecules (frame, id, name) VALUES (?, ?, ?)");
00148 
00149     int imol=0;
00150     stmt->Bind(1, frameid);
00151 
00152     for (MoleculeContainer::iterator iter = _qmtop->Molecules().begin();
00153             iter != _qmtop->Molecules().end() ; ++iter) {
00154         Molecule *mol=*iter;
00155         stmt->Bind(2, mol->getId());
00156         stmt->Bind(3, mol->getName());
00157         stmt->InsertStep();
00158         stmt->Reset();
00159         //mol->setDBId(_db.LastInsertRowId());
00160     }
00161 
00162     delete stmt;
00163 }
00164 
00165 void StateSaverSQLite::ReadMolecules(void)
00166 {
00167    Statement *stmt =
00168         _db.Prepare("SELECT name FROM molecules WHERE frame = ?;");
00169     stmt->Bind(1, _frames[_current_frame]);
00170 
00171     while(stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00172         Molecule *mol = _qmtop->CreateMolecule(stmt->Column<string>(0));
00173     }
00174     delete stmt;
00175 }

00177 void StateSaverSQLite::WriteConjugatedSegments(int frameid) {
00178     Statement *update_stmt = _db.Prepare(
00179             "UPDATE conjsegs SET name = ?, type = ?, molecule = ?, frame = ?, pos_x=?, pos_y=?, pos_z=? WHERE _id = ?"
00180     );
00181     Statement *insert_stmt = _db.Prepare(
00182             "INSERT INTO conjsegs (name, type, molecule, frame, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)"
00183     );
00184 
00185 
00186     int imol=0;
00187     for (vector < QMCrgUnit *>::iterator iter = _qmtop->CrgUnits().begin(); iter!=_qmtop->CrgUnits().end(); ++iter) {
00188         QMCrgUnit *crg = *iter;
00189         Statement *stmt;
00190         if(crg->getInDatabase()) {
00191             stmt = update_stmt;
00192             stmt->Bind(8, (int)crg->getId());
00193         }
00194         else
00195             stmt = insert_stmt;
00196 
00197         // cout << "conjseg " << crg->getId() << " " << crg->GetCom() << endl;
00198 
00199         stmt->Bind(1, crg->getName());;
00200         stmt->Bind(2, crg->getType()->GetName());;
00201         stmt->Bind<int>(3, crg->getMolId());;
00202         stmt->Bind(4, frameid);;
00203         stmt->Bind(5, crg->GetCom().getX());;
00204         stmt->Bind(6, crg->GetCom().getY());;
00205         stmt->Bind(7, crg->GetCom().getZ());;
00206         stmt->InsertStep();
00207         stmt->Reset();
00208 
00209         if(crg->getInDatabase())
00210             _conjseg_id_map[crg->getId()] = crg->getId();
00211         else
00212             _conjseg_id_map[crg->getId()] = _db.LastInsertRowId();
00213 
00214         WriteCustomProperties(_conjseg_id_map[crg->getId()], crg->DoubleValues(), "conjseg_properties", "conjseg");
00215     }
00216     delete insert_stmt;
00217     delete update_stmt;
00218 }
00219 
00220 void StateSaverSQLite::ReadConjugatedSegments(void)
00221 {
00222    Statement *stmt =
00223         _db.Prepare("SELECT _id, name, type, molecule FROM conjsegs WHERE frame = ?;");
00224     stmt->Bind(1, _frames[_current_frame]);
00225 
00226     while(stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00227         QMCrgUnit *acrg = _qmtop->CreateCrgUnit(stmt->Column<int>(0),
00228                 stmt->Column<string>(1), stmt->Column<string>(2), stmt->Column<int>(3));
00229         acrg->setInDatabase(true);
00230         ReadCustomProperties(acrg->getId(), acrg->DoubleValues(), "conjseg_properties", "conjseg");
00231     }
00232     delete stmt;
00233 }
00234 
00235 void StateSaverSQLite::WriteBeads(int frameid) {
00236     if(_was_read) return;
00237     Statement *stmt= _db.Prepare(
00238             "INSERT INTO rigidfrags (id,name,symmetry,type,resnr,mass,charge,conjseg_id,"
00239             "conjseg_index,pos_x,pos_y,pos_z,u_x,u_y,u_z,v_x,v_y,v_z,molecule,frame) "
00240             "VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)");
00241 
00242     int i = 0;
00243     for (BeadContainer::iterator iter = _qmtop->Beads().begin();
00244             iter != _qmtop->Beads().end(); ++iter) {
00245         QMBead *bi = dynamic_cast<QMBead*> (*iter);
00246         stmt->Bind(1, bi->getId());
00247         stmt->Bind(2, bi->getName());
00248         stmt->Bind(3,(int)bi->getSymmetry());
00249         stmt->Bind(4, bi->getType()->getName());
00250         stmt->Bind(5, bi->getResnr());
00251         stmt->Bind(6, bi->getM());
00252         stmt->Bind(7, bi->getQ());
00253         stmt->Bind<int>(8, _conjseg_id_map[bi->GetCrgUnit()->getId()]);
00254         stmt->Bind(9, bi->getiPos());
00255         
00256         stmt->Bind(10, bi->getPos().getX());
00257         stmt->Bind(11, bi->getPos().getY());
00258         stmt->Bind(12, bi->getPos().getZ());
00259         stmt->Bind(13, bi->getU().getX());
00260         stmt->Bind(14, bi->getU().getY());
00261         stmt->Bind(15, bi->getU().getZ());
00262         stmt->Bind(16, bi->getV().getX());
00263         stmt->Bind(17, bi->getV().getY());
00264         stmt->Bind(18, bi->getV().getZ());
00265         stmt->Bind(19, bi->getMolecule()->getId());
00266         stmt->Bind(20, frameid);
00267         
00268         stmt->InsertStep();
00269         stmt->Reset();
00270     }
00271 }
00272 
00273 void StateSaverSQLite::ReadBeads() {
00274     Statement *stmt =
00275         _db.Prepare("SELECT "
00276             "rigidfrags._id, rigidfrags.id, rigidfrags.name, symmetry, rigidfrags.type, resnr, mass, charge, molecule, "
00277             "conjseg_id, conjseg_index, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, "
00278             "u_x, u_y, u_z, v_x, v_y, v_z "
00279             "FROM rigidfrags WHERE (frame = ?)");
00280     stmt->Bind(1, _frames[_current_frame]);
00281 
00282     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00283         int id = stmt->Column<int>(1);
00284         string bead_name = stmt->Column<string>(2);
00285         byte_t symmetry = stmt->Column<int>(3);
00286         string type_name = stmt->Column<string>(4);
00287 
00288         int resnr = stmt->Column<int>(5);
00289         double M =  stmt->Column<double>(6);
00290         double Q =  stmt->Column<double>(7);
00291         int molecule = stmt->Column<double>(8);
00292 
00293         int conjseg_id =  stmt->Column<int>(9);
00294         int conjseg_index =  stmt->Column<int>(10);
00295 
00296         vec pos(stmt->Column<double>(11), stmt->Column<double>(12), stmt->Column<double>(13));
00297         vec u(stmt->Column<double>(14), stmt->Column<double>(15), stmt->Column<double>(16));
00298         vec v(stmt->Column<double>(17), stmt->Column<double>(18), stmt->Column<double>(19));
00299         //cout << "read bead with conksegment " << conjseg_id << endl;
00300 
00301         BeadType *type = _qmtop->GetOrCreateBeadType(type_name);
00302         resnr = 0;
00303         QMBead *bead = dynamic_cast<QMBead*>(_qmtop->CreateBead(symmetry, bead_name, type, resnr, M, Q));
00304         _qmtop->getMolecule(molecule)->AddBead(bead, bead_name);
00305 
00306         QMCrgUnit * acrg = _qmtop->getCrgUnit(conjseg_id);
00307         if(acrg == NULL)
00308             throw std::runtime_error("error reading rigid fragments: charge unit not found");
00309         //acrg = _qmtop->CreateCrgUnit(crg_unit_name, type_name, molid);
00310 
00311         bead->setCrg(acrg);
00312         bead->setiPos(conjseg_index);
00313         bead->setPos(pos);
00314         bead->setU(u);
00315         bead->setV(v);
00316         //cout << "pos " << pos << endl;
00317         bead->UpdateCrg();
00318     }
00319     delete stmt;
00320 }
00321 
00322 void StateSaverSQLite::WritePairs(int frameid) {
00323     Statement *stmt;
00324 
00325     _db.Exec("UPDATE pairs SET deleted=1 WHERE conjseg1 IN (SELECT _id from conjsegs WHERE frame = " 
00326         + boost::lexical_cast<string>(frameid) +  ")");
00327     //Statement *update_stmt = _db.Prepare(
00328     //        "UPDATE pairs SET rate12 = ?, rate21 = ?, r_x = ?, r_y = ?,r_z = ?, deleted = 0 WHERE conjseg1 = ? AND conjseg2 = ?");
00329     Statement *update_stmt = _db.Prepare(
00330             "UPDATE pairs SET rate12 = ?, rate21 = ?, r_x = ?, r_y = ?,r_z = ?, deleted = 0, conjseg1 = ?, conjseg2 = ? WHERE _id = ?");
00331     Statement *insert_stmt = _db.Prepare(
00332             "INSERT INTO pairs (rate12, rate21, r_x, r_y,r_z, conjseg1, conjseg2)"
00333             " VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)");
00334 
00335     int i=0;
00336 QMNBList &nblist = _qmtop->nblist();
00337     for(QMNBList::iterator iter = nblist.begin();
00338         iter!=nblist.end();++iter) {
00339         QMPair *pair = *iter;
00340         QMCrgUnit *crg1 = (*iter)->first;
00341         QMCrgUnit *crg2 = (*iter)->second;
00342 
00343         if(pair->getInDatabase())
00344             stmt = update_stmt;
00345         else
00346             stmt = insert_stmt;
00347         //cout << pair->getId() << " " << _conjseg_id_map[crg1->getId()] << " " << _conjseg_id_map[crg2->getId()] <<
00348         // " " << pair->rate12() << " " << pair->rate21() << " " <<  pair->r() << endl;
00349         stmt->Bind(1, pair->rate12());
00350         stmt->Bind(2, pair->rate21());
00351         stmt->Bind(3, pair->r().getX());
00352         stmt->Bind(4, pair->r().getY());
00353         stmt->Bind(5, pair->r().getZ());
00354         stmt->Bind(6, _conjseg_id_map[crg1->getId()]);
00355         stmt->Bind(7, _conjseg_id_map[crg2->getId()]);
00356         if(pair->getInDatabase())
00357             stmt->Bind(8, pair->getId());
00358         ++i;
00359 //        cout << "Writing pair " << pair->rate12() << " " << pair->rate21()
00360 //                << " " << _conjseg_id_map[crg1->getId()] << " " << _conjseg_id_map[crg2->getId()]
00361 //                << " " << pair->r() << endl;
00362         if(stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00363             throw std::runtime_error("Could not write pair "
00364                     + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_conjseg_id_map[crg1->getId()]) + ", "
00365                     + boost::lexical_cast<string>(_conjseg_id_map[crg2->getId()]) + " to database\n"
00366                     + "rate12=" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(pair->rate12())
00367                     + " rate21=" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(pair->rate21()));
00368         };
00369         if(!pair->getInDatabase())
00370             pair->setId(_db.LastInsertRowId());
00371         pair->setInDatabase(true);
00372         stmt->Reset();
00373 
00374         WriteIntegrals(pair);
00375         WriteCustomProperties(pair->getId(), pair->DoubleValues(), "pair_properties", "pair");
00376     }
00377     // cout << "written pairs: " << i << endl;
00378     _db.Exec("DELETE FROM pairs WHERE deleted=1");
00379     delete update_stmt;
00380     delete insert_stmt;
00381 }
00382 
00383 void StateSaverSQLite::ReadPairs(void)
00384 {
00385     Statement *stmt =
00386     _db.Prepare("SELECT pairs._id, conjseg1, conjseg2, r_x, r_y, r_z, rate12, rate21 FROM pairs,conjsegs "
00387             "WHERE (conjsegs.frame = ? and  conjseg1 = conjsegs._id)");
00388     stmt->Bind(1, _frames[_current_frame]);
00389     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00390         int id1 = stmt->Column<int>(1);
00391         int id2 = stmt->Column<int>(2);
00392         QMCrgUnit *crg1 = _qmtop->getCrgUnit(id1);
00393         QMCrgUnit *crg2 = _qmtop->getCrgUnit(id2);
00394         if(crg1 == NULL)
00395             throw std::runtime_error("broken database, pair refers to non-existent conjugated segment");
00396         if(crg2 == NULL)
00397             throw std::runtime_error("broken database, pair refers to non-existent conjugated segment");
00398 
00399         QMPair *pair = new QMPair(crg1, crg2, _qmtop);
00400         _qmtop->nblist().AddPair(pair);
00401         vec r1(stmt->Column<double>(3), stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5));
00402         vec r2 = pair->r();
00403         if(abs(r2 - r1) > 1e-6)
00404             cerr << "WARNING: pair (" << id1 << ", " << id2 << ") distance differs by more than 1e-6 from the value in the database\nread: " << r1 << " calculated: " << r2 << endl ;
00405         pair->setRate12(stmt->Column<double>(6));
00406         pair->setRate21(stmt->Column<double>(7));
00407 
00408         pair->setInDatabase(true);
00409         pair->setId(stmt->Column<int>(0));
00410         ReadCustomProperties(pair->getId(), pair->DoubleValues(), "pair_properties", "pair");
00411         // cout << stmt->Column<int>(0) << "foo" << endl;
00412     }
00413     // cout << "read pairs: " + _qmtop->nblist().size() << endl;
00414     ReadIntegrals();
00415     delete stmt;
00416 }
00417 
00418 void StateSaverSQLite::WriteIntegrals(QMPair *pair)
00419 {
00420     _db.Exec("DELETE FROM pair_integrals WHERE pair = " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(pair->getId()));
00421 
00422     Statement *stmt =
00423     _db.Prepare("INSERT INTO pair_integrals (pair, num, J) VALUES (?, ?, ?)");
00424 
00425     for(int i=0; i<pair->Js().size();++i) {
00426         stmt->Bind(1, pair->getId());
00427         stmt->Bind(2, i);
00428         stmt->Bind(3, pair->Js()[i]);
00429         stmt->InsertStep();
00430         stmt->Reset();
00431     }
00432 
00433     delete stmt;
00434 }
00435 
00436 void StateSaverSQLite::ReadIntegrals()
00437 {
00438     Statement *stmt =
00439     _db.Prepare("SELECT J FROM pair_integrals WHERE pair = ? ORDER BY num");
00440 
00441     for(QMNBList::iterator iter=_qmtop->nblist().begin(); iter!=_qmtop->nblist().end(); ++iter) {
00442         stmt->Bind(1, (*iter)->getId());
00443         while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE)
00444             (*iter)->Js().push_back(stmt->Column<double>(0));
00445         stmt->Reset();
00446     }
00447     delete stmt;
00448 }

00450 
00451 template<typename T>
00452 void StateSaverSQLite::WriteCustomProperties(int object_id, std::map<string, T> &properties,
00453         string table, const string field_objectid, const string field_key, const string field_value)
00454 {
00455     _db.Exec("DELETE FROM " + table + " WHERE " + field_objectid + " = " 
00456         + boost::lexical_cast<string>(object_id));
00457 
00458     Statement *stmt =
00459     _db.Prepare("INSERT INTO " + table + "(" + field_objectid + ", " + field_key + ", " + field_value
00460             + ") VALUES (?, ?, ?)");
00461     for(typename std::map<string, T>::iterator i = properties.begin();
00462             i!=properties.end(); ++i) {
00463         stmt->Bind(1, object_id);
00464         stmt->Bind(2, i->first);
00465         stmt->Bind(3, i->second);
00466         stmt->InsertStep();
00467         stmt->Reset();
00468     }
00469 
00470     delete stmt;
00471 }
00472 
00473 template<typename T>
00474 void StateSaverSQLite::ReadCustomProperties(int object_id, std::map<string, T> &properties,
00475         string table, const string field_objectid, const string field_key, const string field_value)
00476 {
00477     Statement *stmt =
00478     _db.Prepare("SELECT " + field_key + ", " + field_value
00479             + " FROM " + table + " WHERE " + field_objectid + " = ?");
00480 
00481     stmt->Bind(1, object_id);
00482     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00483         properties[stmt->Column<string>(0)] = stmt->Column<T>(1);
00484     }
00485 
00486     delete stmt;
00487 }
